definitions.text: follow stealthily or recur constantly and spontaneously to
examples: the ghost of her mother haunted her

definitions.text: be a regular or frequent visitor to a certain place
continually recurring to the mind; ; - Claudia Cassidy
examples: the cathedral organ and the distant voices have a haunting beauty

definitions.text: having a deeply disquieting or disturbing effect; -Charles Lee
examples: from two handsome and talented young men to two haunting horrors of disintegration
